org.red5.server.api.so

Interface ISharedObjectHandlerProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IServiceHandlerProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IClientSharedObject, ISharedObject, ISharedObjectBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientSharedObject, SharedObjectScope

    public interface ISharedObjectHandlerProvider
extends IServiceHandlerProvider
    Supports registration and lookup of shared object handlers.
    Author:
    The Red5 Project, Joachim Bauch (jojo@struktur.de)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerServiceHandler(Object handler)
      Register an object that provides methods which handle calls without a service name to a shared object.
      void unregisterServiceHandler(String name)
      Unregister the shared object handler for calls without a service name.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.red5.server.api.service.IServiceHandlerProvider

        getServiceHandler, getServiceHandlerNames, registerServiceHandler

    • Method Detail

        Register an object that provides methods which handle calls without a service name to a shared object.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler object

        Unregister the shared object handler for calls without a service name.

        Parameters:
